channel.title: Server Crash Error
channel.description:
My server seems to keep crashing and it shows this :S
iHaxx [fatal] - exception java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000000 at stream.writeDWord(stream.java:257) at client.addItem(client.java:10400) at client.buyItem(client.java:19558) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15087) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12716) at client.process(client.java:12669) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:164) at server.main(server.java:59) Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000002 at java.lang.String.getBytes(String.java:919) at stream.writeString(stream.java:281) at client.sendFrame126(client.java:7619) at client.prayerStat(client.java:718) at client.process(client.java:11910) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:164) at server.main(server.java:59)
Anyone know how i can fix this ?

item.title: Server Crash Error

My server seems to keep crashing and it shows this :S

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000000
